name: Manic Mitosis
description:
Submission for Trijam 169

You control the orange cell that starts at the top of the play window

Controls:

A/D or LArrow/RArrow : Rotate character

W/S or UArrow/Darrow : Move character

Heavily inspired by Spore's Cell stage. The goal is to survive as long as possible while avoiding a build up of the red carnivorous cells. The color of a cell is an indicator of it's diet ; Green cells will seek and eat plants, red cells will seek to eat non-red cells, and the orange cell (you) can eat green cells and plants.

A cell will split into two children upon eating, and once the children mature they can eat too. One plant matter can eventually spawn 4 red cells, so the population can explode quite rapidly!

Originally a Hunger feature was planned to encourage the player to make strategic diet decisions on the fly, and to penalize strategies such as eating all herbivores at the beginning of the game or just running away from reds. However, we felt other features had priority and we weren't able to implement hunger within the 3 hour time limit.

Asset credits:

TeeKay - Cell sprite base

https://opengameart.org/content/cell

Prushik - What became the plant food type
